author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Man Loses Both Parents And Sister To Coronavirus In Two Weeks
description: Keith MacVicar, 84, and his wife Jean MacVicar, 82, both died of COVID-19 two weeks ago. Their daughter Jayne also caught the virus and died over the Easter weekend.
content:
A man in the U.K. has shared his devastating story after losing his elderly parents and sister to coronavirus in the space of two weeks.
Keith MacVicar, 84, and his wife Jean MacVicar, 82, both died from COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus,… [+5140 chars]
